message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and efficiency. Given its high quality and unique features, it's valued at $12000 to me. Considering its immense potential benefits, I am offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $10000. This opportunity is tailored to provide you with substantial savings while ensuring you receive a product that exceeds your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
